metadata.name: Her Grandmother's Robot
metadata.description:
Reinterpretations of Hollywood Dreams, glamour and mid-21st century robot ideations half a century from when the artist first pondered them.

What was once the purview of male Hollywood, is now within the realm of female ownership - - with the robot center stage as the 'other' in the relationship. Beauty, same.

Her Grandmother knew this, and prepared her for the beauty of mechanics.

This is her Grandmother's Robot.
